headline: Exxon, SLB in Talks with Chile on Lithium Expansion Amid Rising Demand
summary: Exxon Mobil and SLB are exploring lithium opportunities in Chile as demand for EV battery materials rises.

headline: Schlumberger: Energy Diversification, Some AI, Shareholder-Friendly Company
summary: Schlumberger has underperformed since Q3 2023 but shows value with recent earnings beats. Check out why I reiterate a buy rating on SLB stock.
